definition: suffix of a noun of locality
frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]

sentences.english: The issue can be solved simply by setting up e. g. a transparent border.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題也可以設置比如透明的邊框來解決。

sentences.english: For example, applying a border style to a heading could help readability.
sentences.chinese: 例如，在標題上應用邊框樣式有助於提高可讀性。

sentences.english: I also shot through some reeds, which gives it an attractive frame.
sentences.chinese: 我隔着葦草拍攝，形成一個富有吸引力的邊框。

sentences.english: The task is shown in the visual diagram with a black border.
sentences.chinese: 該任務在可視關係圖中顯示爲帶黑色邊框。

sentences.english: Why won't border-radius round off the actual border-style?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不從實際邊界半徑圓的邊框樣式？

sentences.english: A simple but efficient algorithm addressed for fixed-outline floorplanning is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新的固定邊框的布圖算法。

sentences.english: You’llnotice it changes the Background and color of the window border colors.
sentences.chinese: 你會發現它改變了背景和窗口邊框顏色。

sentences.english: Wire frames and bounding boxes solve problems of object visibility.
sentences.chinese: 線框和邊框解決了對象的可視化問題。

sentences.english: Breakpoint icons also appear in the fringe or margin.
sentences.chinese: 斷點圖標同樣顯示在邊框或邊欄上。

sentences.english: The border is used to define the stretchable and static areas of the image.
sentences.chinese: 這個邊框是用來定義圖片的可伸縮和靜態區域。

sentences.english: This widget separates its children with a border the user can adjust.
sentences.chinese: 該窗口構件用一個用戶可以調節的邊框分隔其子元素。

sentences.english: Some have borders, is called "hollow out flower board".
sentences.chinese: 一些有邊框的則被稱爲“鏤空花板”。

sentences.english: Like a picture, no frame, see it's simple and plain.
sentences.chinese: 像一幅畫，沒有邊框，它樸實無華。

sentences.english: Finish it off with a fake Polaroid frame.
sentences.chinese: 最後套上一個假的寶麗來邊框。

sentences.english: The bezel of the watch, being polished stainless steel, is very strong, but scratches easily.
sentences.chinese: 表鏡邊框，是不鏽鋼拋光的，很堅固，但很容易劃傷。

sentences.english: This will let us add and see its ports around on its borders.
sentences.chinese: 這將允許我們添加和查看其邊框周圍的端口。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
to glue to/to paste onto/to stick on/also written 粘貼|粘贴[zhan1 tie1]
